address: Xã Tân Khánh Hòa, Huyện Giang Thành, Tỉnh Kiên Giang
thought:
**Identifying the New Administrative Unit for "Xã Tân Khánh Hòa"**

Okay, so the user wants to know the current administrative unit for "Xã Tân Khánh Hòa, Huyện Giang Thành, Tỉnh Kiên Giang."  My initial focus is on "Tỉnh Kiên Giang." I know the first step is always to check province resolutions, specifically those related to potential mergers and changes.  A quick look at the resolutions (60-NQ/TW, in this case) confirms my suspicion: Kiên Giang was merged with An Giang, forming "Tỉnh An Giang." That's the first major piece of the puzzle.

Next, I need to pinpoint the "Xã Tân Khánh Hòa" itself. Now, this is where it gets interesting.  Since Kiên Giang no longer exists in its original form, I need to search through resolutions pertaining to An Giang, looking for any mention of "Xã Tân Khánh Hòa." My initial search led me to "1654/NQ-UBTVQH15," and bingo! There it is. The resolution explicitly merges "Tân Khánh Hòa," along with "Phú Lợi," and "Phú Mỹ," to create a new ward: "Xã Giang Thành."  This feels very promising.

To solidify my analysis, I always cross-reference. I then checked the "New wards" data specifically for "Tỉnh An Giang" and "Xã Giang Thành."  And there it is: a direct match. The data confirms the existence of a "Xã Giang Thành" within the new province of "Tỉnh An Giang." This provides me with a high level of confidence because the resolution directly addresses the old ward and its subsequent reorganization.  Therefore, I am confident that "Xã Tân Khánh Hòa" from the old "Tỉnh Kiên Giang" is now part of the newly formed "Xã Giang Thành" within the current "Tỉnh An Giang."

citation.header: 1654/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh An Giang
citation.line: 78. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của các xã Tân Khánh Hòa, Phú Lợi và Phú Mỹ thành xã mới có tên gọi là xã Giang Thành.
